title: Perfect Pasta Inc. Recalls Frozen Meat and Poultry Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19, 2020 - Perfect Pasta Inc., an Addison, Ill. establishment, is recalling an undetermined amount of heat treated not shelf stable frozen meat and poultry products that were produced without the benefit of federal inspection, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and...
